Job Description Kraft Heinz, The Company As one of the world’s largest food and beverage companies, we are proud to spark joy around mealtimes with a global portfolio of more than 200 brands. Some are iconic brands like Philadelphia Cream Cheese, Kraft Peanut Butter, Kraft Dinner and Heinz Ketchup. Others are fast growing new sensations that defy status quo like CRAVE. No matter the brand, we are united under one vision To Be the Best Food Company, Growing a Better World . Bringing this vision to life are our 36,000+ teammates around the world, making food people love. Together, we help provide meals to those in need through our global partnership and commitment with Rise Against Hunger. And we also stand committed to sustainability, and the health of our planet and its people. Every day, we are transforming the food industry with bold thinking and unprecedented results. If you’re passionate like us - and ready to create the future, build on a storied legacy, and participate as a conscientious global citizen - there’s one thing to do join us.  Our Culture of Ownership, Meritocracy and Collaboration  We’re not afraid to think differently. Embrace new ideas. Dream big. It all comes down to the way we empower our people to own their work. It’s true Our employees are our competitive advantage. As part of the Kraft Heinz family you’re supported to grow and achieve. You’re recognized and rewarded for outstanding performance at every level. You’re given the opportunity to leave your mark and build legacies. But you won’t do it alone. This is where our values and teamwork thrives and collaborative spirit fuels every day. Job Description Summary of Job Responsibilities: Leads multiple site Capital Engineering feasibility studies within the International zone for Growth projects and novel technologies. Support the regions to ensure that Capacity Investments are clearly defined and included in Strategic Plans, Master Plans and AOP, working closely with the International Logistics CoE. Participate in cross functional FEL Peer Reviews for major Capital projects (>$1MM) within the International zone project portfolio, typical $200MM – $300MM per year across 41 sites Develop and deploy preferred suppliers and standardised infrastructure, production flows and equipment to improve speed of execution on major investment projects across International zone. Key Activities Support Feasibilities Studies for major Capex investments for Capacity, Innovation and Cost Improvement and novel technologies, across the International Zone, working closely with S&OP, Supply Chain Development, R&D and FS&Q, with the intention of making more timely decisions. Provide engineering options and Capex estimates for capacity initiatives working together with GCOE and International Network Design teams. Support the development of Capex capacity inputs for the International Capital Investment Strategic Plan – a 5 year prioritised investment plan by site (41 sites and $1B to $1.5B investment across the strategic time horizon), enabling KraftHeinz commercial growth ambitions. Provide support to Heads of Supply, Site Managers and Package Sponsors in the development Site Master Plans (SMPs) that enable KraftHeinz commercial ambitions through lowest cost manufacturing in a safe environment through optimum quality control and processes. Time Horizon = 5 years Participate and lead cross functional FEL Peer Reviews to ensure all major Capital projects (>$1MM) within the International Zone are designed to maintain business continuity, maximise operating income and factory efficiency, including the evaluation of: alternative options, cost estimation and realistic timelines together with Sites, Package sponsors, R&D and FS&Q. Develop Preferred Suppliers to enable Procurement to leverage scale and relationships. Working closely with Capex Procurement, Technical Services, R&D and FS&Q. Develop & deploy standardised infrastructure, production flows and equipment for Capex projects across the International Zone and champion the process in relation to specific projects to ensure compliance. Share benchmarking of common equipment or processes and Capital projects across the International Zone. Identify and evaluate Best Available Technologies and engineering practices, sharing them across the International zone, and globally where appropriate. With the aim of delivering projects in a more consistent and expedient manner. Provide technical support to project engineers as requested during equipment build, acceptance testing and commissioning Hard Skills Experienced engineering projects manager with a minimum of 7-10 years experience across a number of supply chain roles within the FMCG industry, with a degree or equivalent qualification in Mechanical, Chemical or Electrical Engineering. External relationships with OEMs (Original Equipment Manufacturers) and Engineering service organisations throughout the world. Experienced engineer with a thorough knowledge of proven and advanced technology and with the ability to apply that knowledge practically to ensure objective decision making in a timely manner that will provide competitive and innovative advantage. Highly numerate and financially aware to allow project financial analysis to be completed in conjunction with financial analysts Good knowledge and understanding of Supply Chain and overall End to End Business. Demonstrable organising, influencing and planning skills. Oral and written communications including presentation to management forums and able to create concise and effective reports and written business cases for technical and non-technical audiences. Computer literate including knowledge of web-based systems and comprehensive knowledge of Microsoft Windows suite. Ability to support the identification of engineering solutions which maintain or increase competitive advantage and support long term manufacturing strategy. Subscribes to a philosophy of Continuous Improvement, making recommendations as to how the team and processes can improve to deliver against company and department objectives. Able to use experience and judgement to appropriately identify and effectively manage risks and develop contingency plans to resolve.  Scope of the role is International Zone (Latam, EMEA, Asia and ANZ) Reports directly to Head of Engineering Excellence, International (L5) Key customers and interfaces: International Operations Team including: Logistics & Export, Supply, Finance & Procurement International Logistics CoE Global Head of Network Design Region and Site Capital Engineering leads International Food Safety & Quality Assurance Managers International and Regional ORM/EHS Managers Supply Chain and Commercial Finance Managers Supply Chain Development Category Leads Zone and Site Continuous Improvement Managers International Research & Development International and Category Marketing Managers, Senior Brand Managers Location(s) Amsterdam

title: Database Analist
summary: WO-opleiding met aantoonbare statistiek/wiskunde component in het curriculum en 3 tot 5 jaar werkervaring als marketing analist of data scientist.
description: Organisatie Sanoma is het mediabedrijf met het breedste, meest toonaangevende portfolio in Nederland en is in 2017 uitgeroepen tot de beste media exploitant van Nederland. Met onze sterke merken hebben we een stevige marktpositie in alle onderdelen van de mediabranche: publiekstijdschriften, events, customer media, e-commerce, sites en apps. Ons portfolio bestaat uit uiteenlopende A-merken, waaronder AutoWeek, Donald Duck, Flow, Libelle, Margriet, NU.nl, SchoolBANK, Startpagina, Tina, Viva, vtwonen en Veronica Magazine. Sanoma maakt deel uit van de beursgenoteerde Sanoma Group: een media- en educatiebedrijf dat informatie en entertainment verzorgt voor miljoenen mensen in een aantal Europese landen.  De afdeling De Database Analist zal werkzaam zijn binnen de afdeling Consumer & Marketing Intelligence. Dit team heeft o.a. als doel om database insights te creëren en uit te dragen die i.s.m. de business moeten leiden tot betere/nieuwe producten, diensten en beslissingen en daarmee tot meer omzet en winst. De afdeling Consumer & Marketing Intelligence maakt onderdeel uit van Consumer & Trade Marketing, de BtC marketing afdeling van Sanoma. Functie database analist Je zorgt voor en draagt bij aan de creatie en exploitatie van een 360º klantbeeld binnen Sanoma door op basis van database analyses en statistische modellen inzichten te creëren en deze actief uit te dragen. Je werkt daarbij nauw samen met de overige database analisten, database marketeers, marketeers en IT. De belangrijkste verantwoordelijkheden zijn: Voorspelmodellen: Op basis van alle beschikbare data maak je voorspelmodellen om klantgedrag te voorspellen (respons, churn). Hiermee creëer je inzichten die toepasbaar zijn voor marketingdoeleinden. Database analyses: Proactief opzetten en uitvoeren van database analyses i.s.m. business partners gericht op de identificatie en creatie van nieuwe insights en foresights (bijv. segmentaties, klantwaarde e.d.) teneinde het resultaat van Sanoma te optimaliseren Rapportages: Het ontwikkelen en beheren van rapportages t.b.v. BtC marketing Data projecten: Je neemt als analist deel aan strategische projecten en afdelingsprojecten Functie eisen WO-opleiding met aantoonbare statistiek/wiskunde component in het curriculum en 3 tot 5 jaar werkervaring als marketing analist of data scientist. Machine learning kennis is niet nodig, wel modelbouw ervaring Analytisch en secuur Ervaring met database en analyse software, inclusief zelf code kunnen schrijven, bij voorkeur SAS Een sterke sparringpartner voor onze interne klanten Beschikt over uitstekende adviesvaardigheden en is enthousiast over het vak van database analist Overtuigende en inspirerende communicatiestijl Een proactieve zelfstarter die snel nieuwe dingen oppakt, zelf initiatieven ontplooit, ongevraagd advies geeft, onafhankelijk en deels buiten de waan van de dag opereert en gemotiveerd is Sales gedreven; denkt commercieel en sterke focus op resultaat Wat bieden wij Sanoma biedt je een werkomgeving waar je het beste uit jezelf kunt halen. Bij Sanoma werken we volgens het principe van het Nieuwe Werken. Uitgangspunten zijn: plaats- en tijdsonafhankelijk werken op basis van goede afspraken, vertrouwen en verantwoordelijkheid. Je werkt resultaatgericht binnen een flexibele werkomgeving waar samenwerken voorop staat.

title: Senior RFP Writer
summary:
RFP’s are our most direct form of marketing and are crucial in the decision making by our clients.
You are part of the RFP Services & Investment marketing team,…
description: RFP’s are our most direct form of marketing and are crucial in the decision making by our clients. You will therefore be an essential part of the team driving NNIP's business development efforts. Your impact as RFP Writer at NN With your critical eye, you confidently dive deep into the high waves of the financial world. You know exactly what the ins and outs of the industry are. From Due Diligence Questionnaires to a Request for Proposals; you can convert complex material into razor-sharp, watertight documents with which you convince customers to invest at NN Investment Partners. You write clearly and precisely, but also with irrefutable authority and expertise. You tell the customer exactly how the issues surrounding risk and compliance work. This gives prospective clients the confidence to trust and work with NN IP. Your responsibilities Manage Requests For Proposals and Due Diligence Questionnaires, ensuring accuracy, timeliness, and consistency of company-level language in all responses Producing high quality responses, identifying key "win" themes and positioning responses for each request Collaborate with Subject Matter Experts throughout the firm to create accurate responses and to develop sales narrative Commit to improving the efficiency of the RFP process and quality of RFP submissions Build an in-depth understanding of the firm's product offerings and investment capabilities Who you are You are passionate about the information you share with clients. Your own personal interest in the profession drives you to follow the latest developments in the financial sector. You are comfortable working closely with various internal stakeholders and competing priorities. You are able to work under pressure and manage multiple projects simultaneously. Evidence of success in related field of at least 3 – 5 years, including but not limited to RFP writing, editing, consultant relations, institutional sales, client service, marketing, financial news, journalism, technical writing Organized and detail-oriented with strong time management skills and ability to prioritize multiple deadlines Excellent verbal, written, and interpersonal communication skills Self-starter with proven initiative and ability to work independently and as part of a broader team Bachelor’s degree or equivalent Your colleagues You are part of the RFP Services & Investment marketing team, which is part of the marketing department within NN Investment Partners and is responsible for the commercial positioning of our investment strategies and of different capabilities of NN IP as whole and deals with high quality Request for Proposals and Due Diligence Questionnaires from international prospects & clients with the aim to contribute to the commercial success of the organization. The team consists of 10 professionals: six RFP/DDQ writers, two Data Analysts and two Investment Marketers. Continue developing It is important to us that you continue to develop yourself. We give you the space and the confidence to grow in your career as well as a person. We help you with: Plenty of training and learning opportunities in our Learning & Development Centre A large (international) network of colleagues who are keen to share their knowledge with you The autonomy to set out your own development path About NN We help people care for what matters most to them. The world in which we live may change, but what really matters to people remains the same. Family, friends, love, health, home and of course work. You help to make our services more personal and relevant. As an organisation we can really make a difference with all our brands: Nationale-Nederlanden, NN Investment Partners, ABN AMRO Verzekeringen, Movir, AZL, BeFrank, Zicht and OHRA. NN Investment Partners was formed in July 1994, domiciled in The Netherlands. Our successful asset management history, however, dates back 170 years to our rich heritage as a Dutch insurer and commercial bank. NN IP is the asset manager of NN Group N.V., a publicly traded company listed on Euronext Amsterdam. NN Group is an international insurance and asset management company, active in 18 countries, with a strong presence in a number of European countries and Japan. With all our employees the Group offers retirement services, pensions, insurance, investments and banking to approximately 17 million customers. With around 1,000 employees and active in 15 countries across Europe, U.S., Latin America, Asia and Middle East, NN IP provides clients access to domestic, regional and global investment solutions. The extensive scope of NN IP enables us to offer globally a wide variety of investment solutions complemented by best-in-class service. NN IP has EUR 295.4 bln under management (as of September 2020). Employee benefits You are more than a colleague and we understand that very well at NN. You have different roles in life and that involves choices. We give you the opportunity to select the employee benefits that are important to you and that match your personal situation. This includes buying additional leave, flexible working hours or working four nine-hour days. Your holiday allowance and 13th month are paid with your salary monthly, so there is no need to wait. Because of coronavirus, all NN colleagues are currently working from home fully digitally. It is currently not yet clear when we can return to the office. The official location for this job is The Hague. Will you be our new colleague? If you are enthusiastic about this vacancy and think that you would be a good fit for the team at NN, we would like to invite you to apply. We are very keen to find out who you are, what motivates you and what you can contribute to this role at NN. Apply now If you have any questions about the vacancy or the process, give us a call or let us know on WhatsApp. You can reach out to Elise Kapper (Recruiter) via +31 (0)6 14682729 or via elise.kapper@nn.nl. This is a permanent position. A candidate will receive a contract from NN and we are not open to interim/freelance assignments and/or candidates or recruitment agencies. Thank you very much for your understanding.

title: Solution Consultant Amsterdam
summary: 3-5 years’ experience in digital marketing, preferably in cross channel marketing as subject matter expert (channel specialist, CRO, web analyst).
description: Are you a consultant with strong interpersonal and stakeholder management skills and a thorough understanding of the digital marketing landscape? Can you translate strategic business goals into concrete marketing scenarios? Relay42 is looking for a Solution Consultant with strong analytical, communication and problem-solving skills who is not afraid to dive into technical details. Let us introduce ourselves... Relay42 has grown from a start-up to a champion in data marketing technology in Europe. We help top brands achieve a 360-degree view of their customers by connecting all data points and personalizing 1 to 1 communication across all channels and devices in a scalable way. We have become a market leader in the Netherlands, and we are now connecting the rest of the world. Your role: The Solution Consultant helps our clients to implement our technology and subsequently roll-out cross channel customer journeys by delivering on-premise hands-on consulting. Based on the defined roadmap and together with different teams at the client, these customer journeys help realize the cross-channel targets of the client organisation. Onboarding of new clients and execution of Proof of Technology’s (40%) Together with the Lead Consultant, manage customised implementation via standard methodology at new clients to get the platform up and running and demonstrate its capabilities with a use case within a specified time frame Project manage the onboarding, align and communicate the plan and way of working, align internal resources and encourage client resources alignment, manage agreed project timelines, inspire use case options and provide business input with the help of the Lead Consultant Strategy & roadmap definition (15%) Understand goals and business of the client and help transform these into a challenging but feasible roadmap together with the client - Inspire the client with innovative use case/journey examples and new features Ensure commitment and required resources both on Relay42 and client side Deploy a standardized way of working at the client, such as governance, meeting structure, and repeatable value creation process Structural support after onboarding (40%) Help clients create business value by encouraging the roll-out of continuous “always-on” campaign use cases/journeys and long-term best practices of the platform’s capabilities Assist in configuration of customer journeys and use cases and involve technical consultancy and the support team when necessary Deliver additional connectors, with the help of our technical consultancy and product team Offer support with and coordinate basic troubleshooting and act as a bridge between the client team and the Relay42 support and product teams Act as a sparring partner for the solution direction of use cases and customer journeys Track and share results, evaluate and optimize together with the client on a regular basis Have regular business review meetings with client to discuss achievements and plans Business improvement (5%) Initiate, design and implement improvements to our ways of working  What are we looking for? The ideal candidate is a fast learner with getting things done mentality and a hands-on approach. He/she is a fast learner and, thinks in solutions rather than problems. We are looking for someone with excellent organizational and communication skills, who feels confident in giving presentations and a smart initiator. A combination of strong consultancy skills and passion for diving into details. Proactivity is key in this role since we are at the forefront of the fast-moving marketing technology sector. We expect: 3-5 years’ experience in digital marketing, preferably in cross channel marketing as subject matter expert (channel specialist, CRO, web analyst) Fluent in Dutch Experience with data-driven working Consultancy experience and executional responsibility is a pre Basic technical understanding (concept of tag management, what is an API) Experienced in data-driven decision making Working experience in/for enterprise companies What’s in it for you: Competitive salary and a great work environment where your work will have impact. Working with a highly motivated, young and dynamic team with a mission to become market leader in EU. And last but not least, the opportunity to make a real impact and work in an informal and scale-up environment. Pioneering entrepreneurial atmosphere Training, conferences and personal development opportunities Great working environment with options to stimulate or relax your mind Communal lunch & Healthy and less healthy snacks all day long Weekly bootcamp on location Flexible working hours and workspace A fun and connected community with monthly and quarterly meetings/events & Innovation week Pension scheme

title: Junior Product Data Specialist
summary:
Enige werkervaring met product datamanagement of data analist;
Als Junior Data specialist zorg je voor een optimale ondersteuning van de verkoop- organisatie…
description: Als Junior Data specialist zorg je voor een optimale ondersteuning van de verkoop- organisatie door de Product data, efficiënt en effectief te verzamelen en te verrijken en hiermee de basis te vormen voor de Webshop, ERP en logistiek. Je zorgt voor het juiste, en kwalitatief hoogstaand datamanagement van ons artikelbestand. Naast het artikelbeheer en het up-to-date houden van de productinformatie, controleer je ook of het databeleid voldoet aan alle voorwaarden. Wat ga je doen? Als junior product dataspecialist zorg je ervoor dat ons datamanagement zo optimaal mogelijk functioneert; Je zorgt voor het ontwikkelen en uitwerken van standaarden, kaders en richtlijnen op het gebied van artikelbeheer in de ruimste zin van het woord; Je draagt zorg voor kwaliteit van de data door systematische controle op juistheid, volledigheid en tijdigheid; Je beheert de artikeldata voor én in samenwerking met andere afdelingen; je hebt dan ook veel contact met collega’s; Vanuit de leveranciers verkrijg je op meerdere wijze diverse data, die je op een zo efficiënt en optimaal mogelijke wijze weet in te voeren in ons PIM systeem/ERP; Analyseren en beoordelen van de verkregen data op relevantie en volledigheid; Je verwerkt data i.s.m. de afdelingen Category management, Marketing, IT en leveranciers; Wat vragen wij van jou HBO-diploma op het gebied van informatica, ICT, wiskunde, technisch bedrijfskundig; Enige werkervaring met product datamanagement of data analist; Affiniteit met de installatiebranche en/of E-commerce is een pre; Ervaring met data en Excel niveau gevorderden; Goede beheersing van de Nederlandse taal in woord en geschrift. Je bent zelf startend, flexibel, resultaatgericht, vasthoudend en je kunt goed samenwerken. Wat hebben wij te bieden Uitdagend werk en een team van betrokken en gedreven collega’s; Aandacht voor persoonlijke groei; Een prima passend salaris met daarbij aantrekkelijke secundaire arbeidsvoorwaarden volgens CAO Technische Groothandel; Werktijden en dagen in overleg, rekening houdend met jouw werk-privé balans. Contractduur 12 maanden Deadline sollicitaties: 16-3-2021 Soort dienstverband: Fulltime, Bepaalde tijd Aanvullende betalingen: Vakantiegeld Arbeidsvoorwaarden: Pensioen Reiskostenvergoeding Werk vanuit huis Werkschema: Dagdienst ma-vr Ervaring: 3: 1 jaar (Aanbevolen) Thuiswerken: Tijdelijk vanwege COVID-19

title: Project manager E-commerce
summary:
Je werkt nauw samen en vervult een verbindende rol tussen de afdelingen IT, sales, customer service, marketing, logistiek en finance.
Kom je bij ons werken?*.
description: VidaXL zoekt een enthousiaste Project Manager/Business Analyst. Als Project Manager ben je verantwoordelijk voor een effectieve en efficiënte realisatie van een breed scala aan projecten. In overleg met de business stel je constant de juiste prioriteiten en borg je planning en voortgang van de projecten. Je werkt nauw samen en vervult een verbindende rol tussen de afdelingen IT, sales, customer service, marketing, logistiek en finance. Je bent een sterke gesprekspartner en weet stakeholders als geen ander goed te managen. Je maakt deel uit ons product owner team en werkt in tegenstelling tot onze meeste PO’s, domein overschrijdend. Naast het werken aan ‘products’ met een sterk IT component ga je in deze rol ook aan de slag met projecten die dit juist niet hebben. Denk hierbij bijv. aan onze B2B portal of uitbreiding naar nieuwe markten. Je rapporteert in deze rol aan onze programm manager. Dit ga je doen Je bent verantwoordelijk voor het initiëren, implementeren en verder ontwikkelen van een breed projectportfolio. Je verzorgt het definitieve ontwerp (requirements), voorbereiding, planning en uitvoering van projecten; Je waarborgt een tijdige en kwalitatief hoogwaardige oplevering, overdracht en nazorg; Bewaakt de voortgang, scope, budget, architectuur en de juiste en tijdige inzet van (personele) middelen; Organiseren, adviseren, instrueren en leidinggeven aan internationale projectteams; Continue signaleren en toepassen van verbeteringen in de projectmanagementsystematiek. Must haves Afgeronde studie op WO niveau met relevante focus. Bij voorkeur organizational studies, supply chain of business informatics; Minimaal 3 jaar aantoonbare ervaring als Project Manager of Product Owner, bij voorkeur binnen een internationaal georiënteerde e-Commerce organisatie; Je waarborgt een tijdige en kwalitatief hoogwaardige oplevering, overdracht en nazorg; Volwaardig gesprekspartner op alle niveaus en bewezen track-record in stakeholder management; Ruime kennis op het gebied van Project Management, bij voorkeur in een agile/SCRUM ‘way of working’. vidaXL als werkgever VidaXL is een dynamisch internationaal bedrijf dat nieuwsgierigheid, passie en persoonlijke ontwikkeling stimuleert. vidaXL juicht groots denken en het aanpakken van nieuwe uitdagingen toe. Kom langs om onze collega’s te ontmoeten en de teams met professionals aan het werk te zien. Al onze collega’s, met gevarieerde achtergronden, hebben ten minste een aantal dingen gemeen… ambitie, plezier in het werk en het optimaal benutten van vaardigheden. Daarnaast is vidaXL een sterk groeiende internationale organisatie waarbij Project Management een belangrijke component vervult. Gezien de sterke groei en daarmee samenhangende toename van nationale en internationale projecten, zijn we op zoek naar een dynamische en ervaren Project Manager die Project Management naar een hoger niveau gaat tillen. Kom je bij ons werken? Wij kijken uit naar jouw sollicitatie! Stuur je motivatie en cv per e-mail. Neem voor meer informatie contact op met onze manager recruitment: Bas Nissen. Haba Trading B.V. | Mary Kingsleystraat 1 | 5928 SK | Venlo | corporate.vidaxl.com Wij vinden uw privacy belangrijk! Voor meer informatie hierover: http://corporate.vidaxl.com/privacy/ Wij waarderen het wanneer partijen ervan afzien om naar aanleiding van deze advertentie ongevraagd hun diensten aan te bieden. #vidaXL Soort dienstverband: Fulltime, Bepaalde tijd, Onbepaalde tijd Werkschema: Dagdienst Opleiding: Bachelor (Aanbevolen) Thuiswerken: Tijdelijk vanwege COVID-19

title: Data Analyst
summary: Provide the marketing team with strategic guidance in growing streams by developing a thorough understanding of services like Apple Music and Spotify.
description: OUR COMPANY Spinnin' Records is one of the world's best-known dance music labels, with artists such as KSHMR, Sam Feldt, Alok, Mike Williams, Lucas & Steve, Kriss Kross Amsterdam and many more in its roster. The label specializes in electronic music and manages the largest online dance community in the world with more than 12 million followers on social media. In addition, the label has its own Youtube channel with Spinnin' TV, counting more than 28 million subscribers and 17 billion views. We are a growing international company and offer the unique opportunity to be a part of it! WE ARE LOOKING FOR  Data is the lifeblood of today’s record business, and in this role you’ll get a chance to apply your creativity and problem-solving skills to some massive amounts of data to help our labels and artists connect with streaming fans. You will have the opportunity to see the inner workings and decision-making of an international record label - and the chance to influence those decisions with analysis. We’re a collaborative team that loves learning new things, sharing ideas, thinking about the future of the music industry – and helping our company get there. YOU ARE  The specialist with regard to data within Spinnin’ Records; Pro-actively supports the streaming team by analyzing consumer behavior on DSP’s; Liaise with the local marketing, A&R and streaming department by being the go-to person for artist and track analysis; Follow market trends, initiatives and innovations with the music industry; Communicate findings and insights to senior management to establish best practices, playlisting and catalog exploitation, and to guide analysis into action and results; Provide the marketing team with strategic guidance in growing streams by developing a thorough understanding of services like Apple Music and Spotify Collaborate with global team members to explore research projects and help develop the collective body of knowledge on streaming Handle various ad hoc requests and projects JOB REQUIREMENTS  You have a bachelor or master degree. Extensive familiarity with Microsoft Office (Excel, Access, PowerPoint, Word) and Tableau. A results oriented mind-set with strong analytical skills and problem solving ability Strong interpersonal skills and ability to communicate clearly and effectively (orally and in writing) Strong organizational skills with ability to work on multiple projects 2-3 years of experience within the music industry. It would be a big plus if you have: Familiarity with Tableau or similar visualization tools Experience using SQL WHAT DO WE OFFER YOU?  The chance to do what you are good at (and want to be good at) An open culture Training and development opportunities A travel allowance / Remotely working Great team activities and legendary parties such as Spinnin’ Sessions during ADE 24 vacation days + extra days off An Apple MacBook LOCATION  Hilversum/Remote INTERESTED?  We would like to receive your extensive English motivation with CV. Send your application to jobs@spinninrecords.nl for Benita van Binsbergen. We will only process applications in English. Acquisition as a result of this vacancy is not appreciated.

title: First Party Assets Capability Analyst
summary:
You’ll join our Marketing Excellence team where innovations make a clear commercial impact.
And no matter how quickly our markets moves, you move quicker.
description: Job Advert You’ll join our Marketing Excellence team where innovations make a clear commercial impact. And no matter how quickly our markets moves, you move quicker. With responsibility from day one you’ll grow innovative solutions that Create a Cleaner World.  Focusing on insights which define our brands direction, You’ll: Produce comprehensive and insightful reports based on 1st party assets (websites, apps, connected packages, digital couponing) Analyse customer results to drive improvements in our digital activities Support strategic research using primary, secondary, and syndicated data sources Build regular performance summaries and fill ad-hoc requests for Hygiene team Map data from multiple internal and externals sources to present customer insights and overall value of a specific campaign Translate complex data sets into clear and compelling visualized narrative Provide audience profiles and sizing estimates for assessments and planning Provide clear and meaningful fact-based recommendations to strategy, content, and operational teams  You’ll succeed because… …you’re a natural member of the team because you. You: Have experience in operating models that reach beyond the traditional Have 5+ years’ experience in data analysis Have experience in predictive analytics (preferred) Have worked in an FMCG setting before Experienced working in an agile environment Are an innovative thinker who isn’t happy maintaining the status quo Have the ability to understand consumer journeys and combine data from different tools Have the leadership, communication and writing skills to convey key insights from your analysis Have excellent presentation skills and expertise delivering research insights  You will bring skills to the table. You will be: Delivering insights and improvements on potential categories, innovations and continuous improvement Identifying disrupted online consumer journeys Supporting the teams with ad hoc requests on performance reports Supporting the teams with audience segmentation  You’ll love it because… You’ll love it because you’ll get to make an impact like never before. The products you get out there will make people’s lives better. Our Hygiene Home brands will provide an incredible platform for you. And our dynamic, ownership-driven culture will help bring the very best out of you, every day. Equality In Return RB offer very competitive salaries with excellent benefits and the chance to progress your career within a truly global organisation. RB is an equal opportunity employer and all qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, colour, religion, sex, national origin, disability status, protected veteran status, or any other basis protected by appropriate law. All hiring decisions are made based on merit, competence and business need.

title: Business Analyst
summary:
As our business analyst, you are the go to person with regards to data-driven actionable insights.
Mine and analyze data to drive optimization and improvement…
description: Business Analyst (B.I.) High-growth startup looking for a data insights & analytics champion to help build the future of B2B Commerce. In short (TL;DR) Innovative online B2B marketplace to bring brands and retailers together transforming wholesale commerce; Using machine learning to match retailers with suppliers; data, recommendations, social interaction, etc; We've got tons of data, making the most of it is one of our biggest opportunities; Talented team and extremely ambitious roadmap; Transformed a former restaurant into an office space. Obviously, the bar is still standing and open on Friday’s (true story)! About us The retail landscape is rapidly changing. We believe that independent stores can differentiate themselves from the masses by creating a curated product offering. Reinforced by the ‘maker revolution’, there are more brands than ever before. However, there remains many inefficiencies with the current wholesale model, making it difficult for brands to find the right sales channels, and for retailers to discover unique products. We want to enable creators and shop owners from around the world to come together and build upon one another's success. We make wholesale better. On a daily basis, we find unique brands and use machine learning to connect them with the right retailers. We take the guesswork out of the equation by unlocking the power of data for all. Leveraging our social platform to create interactions between both parties, our mission translates two-fold: 1) retailers can easily discover and purchase distinctive and high quality products in smaller quantities and; 2) brands can quickly do business with new buyers in new regions. With our vision to provide unique merchandise for every store, we seek to help both retailers and brands grow their business. Entrepreneurship and commerce is in our DNA; that is why we set out to build this product for our customers. Many of our team members were responsible for the success of SaaS ecommerce platform, SEOshop, which was acquired by Lightspeed before recently going public (TSX: LSPD). Orderchamp is based on the newest technology, is funded by top-tier investors, delivers on an ambitious roadmap, and is supported by a talented team. What are we looking for? Orderchamp is seeking a full-time Business Intelligence Analyst to join our marketplace operations team in Amsterdam. You will be offered a unique opportunity to work across many of our most strategic and innovative projects and to work alongside the management team at Orderchamp. You will understand the performance of our key initiatives and pilots. Examples include modelling the impact of promotions on retention of our buying retailers and setting up control groups, deep-diving specific category analytics with our category managers, and researching commercial analytics for our marketing & sales teams to improve their day-to-day. As our business analyst, you are the go to person with regards to data-driven actionable insights. You are creating dashboards, data-models and analysing ad-hoc requests using our company dataset. This means you know how to cooperate in an interdisciplinary way with multiple departments. Besides this, you're able to instruct other departments to build the right basis to gather data from. You will be the driving force to make sure data-driven decisions are being made on a daily basis. Requirements: Academic (WO) thinking level; You have a technical background in computer science, econometrics or physics; Minimum 2 years of demonstrated experience in data-driven decision-making and sound business judgment through strong analytical thinking; Proven ability to define and prioritise projects based on business value; Knowledge of (My)SQL. Python, R or another scripting language is a big asset; Experience in Tableau & BigQuery; Fluent in English. This is you: You are comfortable with taking the lead on data topics at a fast-growing company; You make sure that nobody makes false inferences from your work; You love tech and have an affinity for retail / e-commerce / SaaS; You can work very independently and speak up when you need help; You have a hands-on mentality. Tackle immediately; You have good tolerance and see problems as a challenge. You will Design and manage our business reporting environment within a professional BI tool; Mine and analyze data to drive optimization and improvement of categories, product development, marketing techniques, sales initiatives and business strategies; Work across a range of strategic business questions, completing bespoke pieces of analysis to determine strategy & future investments; Build out dashboards to understand performance of key initiatives across the organization ensuring everybody looks at the same data; * Develop processes and tools to monitor and analyze model performance and data accuracy; Join the management-led taskforce on data and create the vision, define use cases and formulate an implementation plan and the execution of how we use our data to help retailers and brands succeed on the platform; Work with many of the tools in the data stack (below), have a basic understanding about all and are able to help us structure their outputs. We offer: Competitive salary; Excellent work equipment (MacBook, large screen, etc.); A real ambitious, fun and inspiring work surrounding (see above); A spacious office in the heart of Amsterdam (Leidseplein), incl. N64/Switch/PS1; Room for ownership and initiative within a fast-growing start-up organisation; Weekly drinks in Amsterdam. We celebrate our success! Job Types: Full-time, Temporary, Permanent Experience: business analysis: 2 years (Required)

title: Senior RFP Writer
summary:
RFP’s are our most direct form of marketing and are crucial in the decision making by our clients.
You are part of the RFP Services & Investment marketing team,…
description: RFP’s are our most direct form of marketing and are crucial in the decision making by our clients. You will therefore be an essential part of the team driving NNIP's business development efforts. Your impact as RFP Writer at NN With your critical eye, you confidently dive deep into the high waves of the financial world. You know exactly what the ins and outs of the industry are. From Due Diligence Questionnaires to a Request for Proposals; you can convert complex material into razor-sharp, watertight documents with which you convince customers to invest at NN Investment Partners. You write clearly and precisely, but also with irrefutable authority and expertise. You tell the customer exactly how the issues surrounding risk and compliance work. This gives prospective clients the confidence to trust and work with NN IP. Your responsibilities Manage Requests For Proposals and Due Diligence Questionnaires, ensuring accuracy, timeliness, and consistency of company-level language in all responses Producing high quality responses, identifying key "win" themes and positioning responses for each request Collaborate with Subject Matter Experts throughout the firm to create accurate responses and to develop sales narrative Commit to improving the efficiency of the RFP process and quality of RFP submissions Build an in-depth understanding of the firm's product offerings and investment capabilities Who you are You are passionate about the information you share with clients. Your own personal interest in the profession drives you to follow the latest developments in the financial sector. You are comfortable working closely with various internal stakeholders and competing priorities. You are able to work under pressure and manage multiple projects simultaneously. Evidence of success in related field of at least 3 – 5 years, including but not limited to RFP writing, editing, consultant relations, institutional sales, client service, marketing, financial news, journalism, technical writing Organized and detail-oriented with strong time management skills and ability to prioritize multiple deadlines Excellent verbal, written, and interpersonal communication skills Self-starter with proven initiative and ability to work independently and as part of a broader team Bachelor’s degree or equivalent Your colleagues You are part of the RFP Services & Investment marketing team, which is part of the marketing department within NN Investment Partners and is responsible for the commercial positioning of our investment strategies and of different capabilities of NN IP as whole and deals with high quality Request for Proposals and Due Diligence Questionnaires from international prospects & clients with the aim to contribute to the commercial success of the organization. The team consists of 10 professionals: six RFP/DDQ writers, two Data Analysts and two Investment Marketers. Continue developing It is important to us that you continue to develop yourself. We give you the space and the confidence to grow in your career as well as a person. We help you with: Plenty of training and learning opportunities in our Learning & Development Centre A large (international) network of colleagues who are keen to share their knowledge with you The autonomy to set out your own development path About NN We help people care for what matters most to them. The world in which we live may change, but what really matters to people remains the same. Family, friends, love, health, home and of course work. You help to make our services more personal and relevant. As an organisation we can really make a difference with all our brands: Nationale-Nederlanden, NN Investment Partners, ABN AMRO Verzekeringen, Movir, AZL, BeFrank, Zicht and OHRA. NN Investment Partners was formed in July 1994, domiciled in The Netherlands. Our successful asset management history, however, dates back 170 years to our rich heritage as a Dutch insurer and commercial bank. NN IP is the asset manager of NN Group N.V., a publicly traded company listed on Euronext Amsterdam. NN Group is an international insurance and asset management company, active in 18 countries, with a strong presence in a number of European countries and Japan. With all our employees the Group offers retirement services, pensions, insurance, investments and banking to approximately 17 million customers. With around 1,000 employees and active in 15 countries across Europe, U.S., Latin America, Asia and Middle East, NN IP provides clients access to domestic, regional and global investment solutions. The extensive scope of NN IP enables us to offer globally a wide variety of investment solutions complemented by best-in-class service. NN IP has EUR 295.4 bln under management (as of September 2020). Employee benefits You are more than a colleague and we understand that very well at NN. You have different roles in life and that involves choices. We give you the opportunity to select the employee benefits that are important to you and that match your personal situation. This includes buying additional leave, flexible working hours or working four nine-hour days. Your holiday allowance and 13th month are paid with your salary monthly, so there is no need to wait. Because of coronavirus, all NN colleagues are currently working from home fully digitally. It is currently not yet clear when we can return to the office. The official location for this job is The Hague. Will you be our new colleague? If you are enthusiastic about this vacancy and think that you would be a good fit for the team at NN, we would like to invite you to apply. We are very keen to find out who you are, what motivates you and what you can contribute to this role at NN. Apply now If you have any questions about the vacancy or the process, give us a call or let us know on WhatsApp. You can reach out to Elise Kapper (Recruiter) via +31 (0)6 14682729 or via elise.kapper@nn.nl. This is a permanent position. A candidate will receive a contract from NN and we are not open to interim/freelance assignments and/or candidates or recruitment agencies. Thank you very much for your understanding.

title: Assistant Director Sales Representative
summary: Undergraduate/first-level degree (e.g., Bachelor’s degree) required, with coursework in business, economics, finance, marketing or related fields.
description: Role/Responsibilities This role is responsible for working with other sales colleagues and internal stakeholders to drive the sales process for RDC solutions within the French and BeNeLux mid-market finance and corporate clients and prospects. Key activities include identifying and qualifying prospects, initiating new sales activity and managing sales cycles to closure. Additionally, the role requires the assessment of client needs and providing clients with strategic guidance and product overviews.  Responsibilities: Meet or exceed annual sales goals and targets that align with the company’s vision and objectives. Work with sales colleagues and other internal stakeholders to drive the sales process from beginning to end by identifying and qualifying prospects, initiating new sales activity and managing sales cycles to closure. Drive the development of business within assigned territories. Build relationships across client and prospect organizations to maintain desired pipeline levels. Partner with Solution Specialists to develop clear, concise proposals and deliver targeted client demos that address client needs. Collaborate with Product Management and Product Strategy to promote improvement in product quality and the development of new sources of revenue. Assess the needs of the client by identifying specific cause of underlying problems and proposes innovative solutions based on their business requirements. Identify additional products and services that clients may benefit from and introduce them appropriately into dialogue with clients. Begin development as a market expert and provide product/service use cases during the sales cycle. Serve as the main liaison between the client service team, the client and the implementation services organization on each services opportunity. Coordinate Moody's Analytics responses to requests for product and services information from prospects and clients. Assist in the preparation and circulation of market insight comments to create awareness of Moody's expertise internally and externally. Assist in the training of new team members. Provide current forecasts and pipeline information to management. Position requires travel (approximately 20% to 40% of your time Covid Permitting). Qualifications Undergraduate/first-level degree (e.g., Bachelor’s degree) required, with coursework in business, economics, finance, marketing or related fields. The role will be targeting French/BeNeLux speaking territory and require excellent verbal/written communication and presentation skills in both English and French or Dutch. Experience working in direct business-to-business sales roles with a focus on serving financial services and/or corporate treasury customers. Solid understanding of different parts of the global financial services industry, including market dynamics and customers’ business drivers. Ability to present high-level information as well as detailed demonstrations of products & services. Ability to work both independently and within a team environment, with focus and high attention to detail. LOB/Department RDC is now a Bureau van Dijk and Moody’s Analytics company!  RDC specialises in 3rd party screening and monitoring solutions for Anti-Money Laundering (AML), Know Your Customer (KYC), Anti-Bribery & Corruption, and Politically Exposed Person risk management.  As a data-driven technology business, RDC meets a client’s key challenge of reducing the time and effort taken to successfully assess and monitor all counterparties for pertinent risks, whilst improving the accuracy of decision  RDC’s AI Review solution allows clients to utilise a proprietary ML model, trained on over 12 million profiles curated over 20 years, then augmented to suit the client’s risk appetite, and reduces Line 1 analysts workload by as much as 80%  By improving the speed, consistency, transparency and scalability of 3rd party screening and monitoring processes, RDC is uniquely placed to help clients to make better, faster decisions, reducing the risk of financial and reputational damage in a fast-evolving regulatory landscape  Job Req ID 19868BR Entity Moody's Analytics (MA) Line of Business Bureau van Dijk (BvD) Regular/Temporary Regular City Amsterdam, Brussels, London Job Category Sales & Marketing Job Sub Category Sales Experience Level Experienced Hire Working at Moody's Moody's (NYSE: MCO) is a global integrated risk assessment firm that empowers organizations to make better decisions. Our data, analytical solutions and insights help decision-makers identify opportunities and manage the risks of doing business with others. We believe that greater transparency, more informed decisions, and fair access to information open the door to shared progress. With over 11,000 employees in more than 40 countries, Moody's combines international presence with local expertise and over a century of experience in financial markets. Learn more at moodys.com. Entity Moody’s Analytics provides financial intelligence and analytical tools supporting our clients’ growth, efficiency and risk management objectives. The combination of our unparalleled expertise in risk, expansive information resources, and innovative application of technology, helps today’s business leaders confidently navigate an evolving marketplace. EEO Policy Moody’s is an equal opportunity employer. All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, religion, sex, national origin, disability, protected veteran status, sexual orientation, gender expression, gender identity or any other characteristic protected by law. Securities Trading Policy (STP) Candidates for Moody's Corporation may be asked to disclose securities holdings pursuant to Moody’s Policy for Securities Trading and the requirements of the position. Employment is contingent upon compliance with the Policy, including remediation of positions in those holdings as necessary.

title: Director of Communications
summary: This role carries global responsibility for Canonical communication activities across press, analyst, social media...
description: About this role: Director of Communications. The person who will redefine the perception of open source in the enterprise. Canonical, the publisher of Ubuntu and a leader in open source solutions and services, is hiring a technologist, raconteur and writer to tell the next chapter of its growth story. This role carries global responsibility for Canonical communication activities across press, analyst, social media...  The ideal candidate: We're looking for a seasoned corporate communications professional to help grow Canonical brands and influence across the globe. In this role you'll be crafting our narrative, shaping our responses to industry events and trends, providing strategic input to executives on a range of industry and public relations topics. The Communications Team - AR, PR, social, content - report up to this role as well as agency management. The ideal candidate is an entrepreneurial leader, who will work closely with senior leadership, product teams, customers and partners to orchestrate the growth in visibility of our brands and company. They will also demonstrate the ability to collaborate with engineering, HR and customer success to encourage and amplify developer and community advocacy. Candidates will need to demonstrate their ability to build thought leadership programs and achieve cohesion and consistency in messaging and tone of voice across channels. Candidates with extensive communications experience in the SAAS, cloud, system integration and IT services industries who have operated across verticals and regions will be well placed for this position. Canonical is a distributed organisation and most executives are not office-based. The role reports to the VP of Marketing who is primarily in EMEA time zones. The business is global and exceptional candidates from all regions will be considered.  Canonical believes a diverse workforce enhances our ability to deliver world class software and services which meet the world's computing needs. We are committed to ensuring equal employment opportunities to all qualified individuals. All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, religion, gender, gender identity or expression, sexual orientation, national origin, genetics, disability, age, or veteran status.  #LI-remote

title: Onderzoeksanalist
summary: Jij analyseert ontwikkelingen en maakt rapportages op basis van deskresearch, data-analyse, marktonderzoek, marketing intelligence, klantvalidatie-onderzoek …
description: Onderlinge ’s-Gravenhage heeft voor haar locatie in Den Haag een vacature voor een Onderzoeksanalist Expert in Leden en Marktonderzoek 38 uur Over Onderlinge 's-Gravenhage Wij zijn Onderlinge ’s-Gravenhage. Ja, we hebben een kantoor, we hebben collega's die alles weten over pensioenen en levensverzekeringen, we hebben een directie en we hebben een jaarverslag. We lijken dus net een gewoon bedrijf, maar dat zijn we niet. We zijn een club met leden. Leden die al sinds 1895 elkaars belang dienen. En we weten dat het leven om meer draait dan geld alleen. Daarom zijn we samen bezig met alles wat de tweede helft van het leven nog mooier kan maken. En dat doen wij vanuit onze kernwaarden: Samen, Zeker en Betrokken. Al 125 jaar. Om daar samen verder invulling aan te geven zoeken wij een Expert Leden & Marktonderzoek. Ons team Ledenmanagement Wij werken en denken vanuit de behoeftes van onze leden. Die staancentraal bij ons. Met onze leden werken wij samen aan innovaties en ontwikkeling van (nieuwe) diensten en producten. Collega's, experts op het gebied van communicatie, marketing, productontwikkeling en partnership, werken op agile, flexibele wijze samen aan deze vernieuwing. Zo kunnen wij bijdragen aan een mooie tweede levensfase voor onze leden. Wat ga je doen als Expert Leden & Marktonderzoek? Jij signaleert alle relevante ontwikkelingen bij de doelgroep en in de markt en volgt de ontwikkelingen bij concurrenten; Jij bedenkt op basis van data- en doelgroep analyses creatieve concepten voor producten, diensten en services en speelt hiermee in op de behoefte van de doelgroep; Jij komt met ideeën en suggesties voor nieuwe mogelijkheden en verbeteringen en stelt deze voorstellen op; Jij bent verantwoordelijk voor het commerciële klant-databeleid en de uitvoering hiervan; Jij analyseert ontwikkelingen en maakt rapportages op basis van deskresearch, data-analyse, marktonderzoek, marketing intelligence, klantvalidatie-onderzoek (zelfstandig of in sommige gevallen met externe bureaus); Jij geeft presentaties en neemt deel aan externe evenementen (beurzen en congressen). Jij levert een bijdrage aan het tot stand komen van ondersteunend materiaal zoals brochures, formulieren en informatie op de website; Jij bent het aanspreekpunt voor externe partijen zoals erkende onderzoeksbureaus, consumentenorganisaties, data-expertise bureaus en andere relevante partijen op het gebied van leden en data. Wie ben jij? Ben jij van nature nieuwsgierig aangelegd en geïnteresseerd in wat onze doelgroep beweegt? Dan gaan we graag het gesprek met je aan. Wij zoeken iemand met WO werk- en denkniveau en een afgeronde opleiding op expertisegebied. Het realiseren en managen van strategische doelgroep analyses spreekt je aan en jij hebt kennis en ervaring met leven, pensioen (of financiële sector) en de doelgroepen. Daarnaast ben jij secuur, klantgericht en initiatiefrijk. Wat kan je van ons verwachten? Wij zijn een “echte” Onderlinge en dat merk je aan alles. Wij denken vanuit onze leden, dat zit in ons DNA. En dus hebben wij een informele werkomgeving met enthousiaste en gedreven collega’s die zich maatschappelijk betrokken voelen. Het is een afwisselende functie met veel ruimte voor persoonlijke ontwikkeling. En ja, een prima salaris met bijbehorende secundaire arbeidsvoorwaarden. Doe je mee? Dan ontvangen wij graag je CV en motivatiebrief. Stuur je sollicitatie via onze sollicitatiepagina door te klikken op de solliciteerbutton. Voor vragen over de functie kun je contact opnemen met adjunct-directeur Ledenmanagement Axel de Boer of Ledenmanager a.i. Edser Kuiper via telefoonnummer 070 - 342 11 11. Zij vertellen je graag meer over de inhoud van het werk, het bedrijf en de collega’s. Wij zijn Onderlinge 's-Gravenhage. Wij regelen onze financiële zaken samen. Doe je mee? Acquisitie naar aanleiding van deze vacature wordt niet op prijs gesteld. Trefwoorden: Analyse, Analyseren, Data-Analyse, Analist, Data Analist, Marktonderzoek, Marketing Intelligence, Klantvalidatieonderzoek, vacature Den Haag, bedrijfsanalist

title: Performance Web Tracking Specialist
summary:
You will implement and maintain our performance marketing web tracking setups.
You perform data analysis, validation and maintaining data quality of the…
description: You figure out how people get to our web applications and how they use them, find the pain points and help wrinkle them out. Google Analytics, Tealium, GTM are some of the toolings you are using to get the data. You know that data does not just fall from the sky (or from a tracking script) so you are tech-savvy enough to identify, track, and use the data so that your colleagues can optimise their online campaigns and optimize the user experience. Our story (the bitesize version) We've grown from an attic start-up to become Just Eat Takeaway, a global food delivery powerhouse. With customers across 24 countries, we take millions of orders every day from Amsterdam to Auckland! What you'll do as a Performance Web Tracking Specialist: Our measurement specialists are the experts at capturing all relevant data with a high accuracy in a GDPR compliant way, using a wide range of tools, platforms and strategies. This position is a varied role packed with exciting challenges. Data and implementation skills are a key part of this role. It's your job to help us in setting up, implementing and maintenance of web tracking and platform connections. You'll perform data analysis, validation and maintaining data quality of the performance marketing workflow while working closely with our Front End Developers. You will implement and maintain our performance marketing web tracking setups. You perform data analysis, validation and maintaining data quality of the marketing workflow. You co-develop and manage the web tracking strategy. You maintain and safeguard a correct GA channel allocation. Deliver solutions for new market developments; ITP, Adblockers, technical GDPR support. You work closely with our Front End Development team and global Data & Analytics team. You continuously find improvements and troubleshoot the tracking implementations. Your profile You have at least 2-3 years working experience as a Web Analyst or Web Tracking specialist. You have the ability to collaborate with technical and non-technical teams. You're an expert in using Tealium, Google Tag Manager and Google Analytics. A basic level of knowledge regarding specialisms (SEA, SEO, Display, App, Affiliate, etc) and related tools and technologies. You know exactly how data is gathered, processed by the different tools and are strong in deriving actionable insights. You relish working in a team and enjoy collaborating and sharing knowledge with your peers You have a sense of ownership and pride in your performance and its impact on the company's success You are a critical thinker with outstanding problem-solving skills Knowledge of BigQuery or CDP/DMP implementation is a nice to have Our offer The freedom to go where no one in our company has gone before; Possibilities to strengthen your skills and grow in the role; Work in a fast-growing company; Being part of a young, professional and international team; A competitive salary; Custom workstations/laptops (Mac/Linux/PC); Opportunity to join native language courses; Traveling between the different office locations Awesome company events; Free drinks and fruits.

title: Senior Business Analist PIM/PXM
summary: Onze opdrachtgever is een eigenzinnig wereldwijd full-service digitaal marketing bureau gevestigd in de buurt van Amsterdam dat met succes retailers, merken,…
description: Functiebeschrijving: Onze opdrachtgever is een eigenzinnig wereldwijd full-service digitaal marketing bureau gevestigd in de buurt van Amsterdam dat met succes retailers, merken, fabrikanten en groothandels inspireert en laat groeien in e-commerce, CX / UX en PIM / PXM. Hun doel is om klanten blij te maken met de ultieme gebruikerservaring op alle kanalen. Om te blijven doen wat ze graag doen, zijn ze op zoek naar een: Senior Business Analist PIM / PXM om hun team te versterken. Ben jij een Business Analist met de onderzoekende geest en overtuigingskracht om te ontrafelen wat een klant echt nodig heeft? Dan ben jij de persoon die wij in ons team willen hebben! Als onze nieuwe e-commerce bedrijfsanalist heb je een unieke positie in een multidisciplinair team dat digitale oplossingen creëert voor een breed scala aan internationale topklanten, zoals: Jumbo, Tommy Hilfiger, Specialized, Xerox, Plus Supermarkets, Staples en Shark Ninja. Als Senior Business Analist PIM / PXM (Product Informatie / eXperience Management) ben je een belangrijke speler in onze implementatieprojecten voor PIM / PXM; Je bent verantwoordelijk voor het verzamelen van vereisten en zakelijke behoeften en je bent een gids voor onze klanten bij de implementatie; Je organiseert en leidt workshops om de business te begrijpen en de resultaten te valideren en deze te vertalen naar requirements / user stories voor het ontwikkelteam; Je focust op bedrijfswaarde en werkt samen met het ontwikkelingsteam om oplossingen voor te bereiden, te configureren en te implementeren om de bedrijfswaarde te realiseren; Je demonstreert en legt voorgestelde oplossingen uit in de context van de bedrijfsprocessen aan de zakelijke gebruikers en traint ze; Je helpt ons business development team met je expertise in het maken van offertes en het doen van demo’s in pitches bij prospects; Je assisteert projectmanagement bij planning, risicomanagement, inschattingen. Gewenst profiel: Uitstekende communicatieve en interpersoonlijke vaardigheden; Uitstekende analytische vaardigheden en het vermogen om complexe productstructuren en complexe bedrijfsprocessen te begrijpen; Mogelijkheid om projecten vanuit het perspectief van de klant te bekijken; Afgestudeerd in informatica, bedrijfsinformatiesystemen, bedrijfskunde of vergelijkbaar onderwijs, met een focus op informatietechnologie; Sterke kennis van conceptuele PIM-principes en PIM-governance; Sterke kennis van bedrijfsprocesmodellering, datamodellering, standaarden en compliance; Ervaring met minimaal 1 PIM / PXM platform (voorkeur voor Salsify of Riversand); Kennis en begrip van Agile / Scrum; Kennis van Jira, Confluence; Ervaring met PIM / PXM-implementatieprojecten; Ervaring in integratieprojecten met complexe business lines, complexe productstructuren, complexe interfaces, verschillende landinstellingen en verschillende talen; Ervaring in Agile / scrum-projecten; Bereidheid om te reizen (30% van de tijd in Nederland en 5% internationaal, tijdens non covid-19 tijden); Woonachtig in Nederland (vacature niet open voor houders van een blauwe kaart of andere werkvergunninghouders). Het aanbod: Veel vrijheid in je werk en in het nemen van initiatief; Budget voor training en opleiding over verschillende onderwerpen; Uitdagende projecten voor nationale en internationale klanten en merken Laptop, mobiele telefoon; Sociale evenementen (pubquiz, kerstfeest, etc.); Lekkere lunches (ook vegetarisch / veganistisch) verzorgd door onze eigen catering. De organisatie: Het in de buurt van Amsterdam gevestigde bedrijf is een eigenzinnig wereldwijd full-service digitaal bureau dat met succes retailers, merken, fabrikanten en groothandels inspireert en laat groeien in e-commerce, CX / UX en PIM / PXM. Hun doel is om klanten blij te maken met de ultieme gebruikerservaring op alle kanalen. De experts inspireren, ontwerpen, implementeren, integreren en realiseren succesvolle eCommerce-, CX / UX- en PIM / PXM-oplossingen waarmee B2B- en B2C-bedrijven kunnen groeien. Onze partners zijn onder meer Intershop, CommerceTools, Adobe Magento, SAP Hybris, Salsify Informatica, ContentServ, ContentSquare en Optimizely. Iedereen heeft zijn eigen kwaliteiten. Bij het bedrijf maakt het niet uit wat uw individuele rol is; ze zijn maar een team en willen het allerbeste voor hun klanten. Hierdoor begrijpen ze hun klanten en hebben ze veel kennis van de uitdagingen waar hun klanten dagelijks voor staan. Ze spreken dezelfde taal en stoppen pas als de klant tevreden is. Wil je meer weten over de organisatie of vacature, neem dan contact op met Martin de Graaf via 024-677 7272 Solliciteren kan natuurlijk ook direct via onderstaande sollicitatiebutton. Contractduur 12 maanden Soort dienstverband: Fulltime, Bepaalde tijd Aanvullende betalingen: Bonusregeling Vakantiegeld Arbeidsvoorwaarden: Auto van de zaak Lunchkorting Pensioen Telefoonplan Vrijdagmiddagborrel Werk vanuit huis Winstdeling Werkschema: ma-vr

title: Data Scientist
summary:
3+ years of experience in a relevant role (Data scientist, Data analyst).
We are a fast-growing themed travel marketplace based in the heart of Amsterdam.
description: Who is Tripaneer? We are a fast-growing themed travel marketplace based in the heart of Amsterdam. We enable our customers to live unforgettable travel experiences via our 11 category sites from yoga retreats to safaris.  Full-time and long term | Join our international team in Amsterdam As a Data Scientist at Tripaneer, you love using data to find areas of improvement which enable the business to grow. At Tripaneer, you will be responsible for guiding and supporting the team with data, reports and models, specifically our Marketing department. As we have a strong focus on growth, your analysis and models will need to be pragmatic and geared to the current focus of the company. You will work on generating new datasets and perform analysis from operational to managerial level. Additionally, you work on pragmatic algorithmic solutions to support the Marketing department in meeting their growth objectives. The analysis you perform can range from very high-level (e.g. How do we define customer attrition and what are the factors that lead to better retention?) to mid-level (e.g. Can we predict high intent customers depending on their behavior in order to tune our retargeting dynamically?) to detail-level (e.g. Are there significant behavioral differences in the customer journey for a particular experiment?). You will work in close collaboration with stakeholders from various teams and levels throughout the organization.  Responsibilities: Build pragmatic models that can run in our high volume production environment to improve our products Collaborate and communicate with the Marketing, Supply, and Product Teams to understand business needs and proactively find the most relevant questions and areas for further research Help define KPI’s and metrics that are measurable and closest to overall business performance Gather and analyze data to validate or invalidate common assumptions about the business Build dashboards and reports around growth initiatives and business priorities Facilitate a data-driven culture (Eg: by presenting your analyses, finding areas for improvement in data and explaining those, empowering stakeholders to find and explore their own data, etc.)   3+ years of experience in a relevant role (Data scientist, Data analyst) Experience in mapping of customer journey and attribution models is a plus Proficient in data mining and advanced modeling techniques including predictive modeling using R and/or Python Proficiency in both SQL and Python is a must Experience with Hadoop, Hive, Spark and similar tools Degree in Computer Science, Math, Statistics or similar quantitative field. Strong technical skills, statistics and the ability to draw business insights from data Excellent communication skills (both verbal and written), ability to convey complex analysis results clearly to all levels of stakeholders Experience in a start up environment is a plus Perks & Benefits: Young, enthusiastic, international working environment Opportunity to make an impact in a fast-growing tech scaleup 25 days holiday Shortlisted candidates will be invited for a Skype interview. All application documents shall be treated with the strictest confidence.

title: (Senior) Data Analyst
summary: You actively contribute to our data warehouse developing, building data pipelines such as marketing attribution models, together with other data engineers in…
description: (Senior) Data Analyst  As Helloprint's new Senior Data Analyst, you create business value and opportunities to grow by uncovering and interpreting our large sets of data every day. A challenging role; With the ambition to become Earth's largest platform for printed products, our data infrastructure and our ability to make our data actionable are the drivers behind that mission. It's your challenge to bring our data maturity to the next level and create value together with the various business departments.  As a senior professional in Team BI, you work with your colleagues from various business departments on challenges and opportunities that allow our business to grow quicker. You take a pragmatic approach to rapidly building visualizations and dashboards, allowing everyone to get actionable insights from high-quality data. With your strong communication skills, you advise teams supported by your data analyses, make sure that we have the right insights to make critical decisions and ensure synergy between teams by aligning their goals and responsibilities. What you do  You are taking a leading role in the domain of business intelligence and data You contribute to critical decisions using data analysis You actively contribute to our data warehouse developing, building data pipelines such as marketing attribution models, together with other data engineers in the team You develop data models and create reports and dashboards with recommendations You support and train other teams within Helloprint in interpreting and analyzing relevant data models and reports.  What we are looking for You have a minimum of 4 years’ experience in data analytics, preferably in a start-up / scale-up environment You have excellent analytical skills (SQL + Python or R highly preferred) You have experience with working on strategic challenges like business plans and growth scenarios Experience in website tracking is a plus (Google Analytics, Google Tag Manager, Segment, Snowplow or similar tools) You have a strong commercial mindset; you see data as an instrument to increase performance You have a no-nonsense and pragmatic attitude and convince others with data-driven argumentation, ensuring trust-based relationships with internal and external stakeholders You like to get things done. When you have an idea, you can't wait to execute and implement it You are confident with working in an international work field  What we offer you  Attractive compensation pack, including bonus agreement and the possibility to join our Stock Option Pool A fast-paced learning curve with large responsibility A unique culture with 22 nationalities where freedom and responsibility are the basis for what we do The most beautiful office in Rotterdam, right in the centre and just 5 minutes away from Rotterdam Central Station Don’t worry about food, that’s on us: breakfast, lunch and dinner. Enough to keep you going all-day 24/7 access to our HelloFit gym The best hardware and software to work with   More about Helloprint Helloprint is a fast-growing international e-commerce company, ready to scale at large. With our mission to become Earth’s largest platform for printed products, we constantly challenge the status quo and try to do things differently. Helloprint is headquartered in Rotterdam, the Netherland’s best place to grow yourself. Together with our offices in Liverpool, Paris, Valencia, Lisbon and Manila, our 160+ team from 22 nationalities is working in an entrepreneurial culture where freedom and responsibility are leading to high-performance.   Up for it? Our Helloprint talent acquisition process is straightforward with one important goal - knowing for sure that you and Helloprint are both up for it in the long run. Our culture is extremely important to us, so a fit between you and our culture is an absolute must. Check for yourself whether you think this would be a good match by reading our Helloprint Culture Book.  When we receive your application and our first impression is positive, we will contact you and explain all the steps that will be part of our process. Enthusiastic? Start today.   Welcome to Helloprint. Design Yourself. acquisition will not be appreciated, potential talent only please.

title: Commercial Data Analyst
summary: Analyze competitor’s pricing to get a better picture of the business environment and help understand the reasons behind the success or failure of a particular…
description: For our client in Curaçao we are looking for a Commercial Data Analyst with a strong capability in quantitative analysis and excellent communication skills with superb attention to details. Main duties and responsibilities: The Commercial Data Analyst is responsible for conducting research of the company’s commercial data such as sales, margins and commercial effectiveness of sales campaigns and pricing to find ways to improve the company’s commercial performance. The Commercial Data Analyst uses mathematical models and predictive economic research to identify patterns and discrepancies in commercial and consumer activity and use this analysis to suggest policy changes and goals to improve profits. The Commercial Data Analysts spots trends and ideas where others might just see a jumble of data. Essentially, the Commercial Data Analyst looks at commercial performance and client satisfaction and determines ways that it can be more successful. Other tasks and responsibilities: In consultation and collaboration with the Category Managers analyze sales figures; Determine methods to improve sales by using detailed economic and mathematical models to predict the outcomes of changes in the business model to sales; Suggest improvements to executives to help them understand the findings to make better business decisions. Often, this involves creating graphs, charts and other visualizations; Analyze competitor’s pricing to get a better picture of the business environment and help understand the reasons behind the success or failure of a particular department or marketing strategy, or the potentials for a future strategy.  Kennis en vaardigheden Master’s Degree with focus on data/ analytical skills, ideally gained in Economics. A minimum of 3 years work experience in a similar position. Experience in Web analytics, market research and statistical analysis and/or modeling. Experience in setting up KPI-dashboards and working with “big data”. Excellent working ability of MS Office (Word, Excel, PowerPoint, Targit is a plus). Ability to work both independently and as part of a team. Ability to work under pressure and establish priorities. Innovative thinker with the ability to think out of the box. Strong in setting up KPI’s and commercial dashboards. Good writing and presentation abilities. Organizational skills. Problem-solvers and detail-oriented skills. Internal Client relationship skills. This role is relatively new, and the post holder will be expected to be proactive in identifying and developing further ways in which data-driven decision making can be beneficial to the team.

title: Data Scientist
summary:
Each of the Calvin Klein brands occupies a distinct marketing identity and position.
4+ years of experience in working in a fast-paced digital agency, Ecomm…
description: About Calvin Klein Calvin Klein is a global lifestyle brand built on iconic essentials and powered by bold, progressive ideals. The Calvin Klein brands — CK Calvin Klein, Calvin Klein, Calvin Klein Jeans, Calvin Klein Underwear and Calvin Klein Performance — provide us with the opportunity to market products both domestically and internationally at various price points, through multiple distribution channels and to different consumer groups. The Calvin Klein brands are also licensed for a range of products, including fragrance, women's apparel, footwear, eyewear, watches and jewelry in various regions. Global retail sales of products sold under the Calvin Klein brands were approximately $9.4 billion in 2019.
